column4: Has anyone done an upgrade of their OS that is using a dm-crypt / LUKS encrypted HD?  I have a laptop that is encrypted and am wanting to upgrade to 10.04 when its released, but I just want to make sure there wont be any issues with it being encrypted
I've had problems with that ever since I upgraded to 9.10, I logged a case for 10.04 and it's underway
what kind of problems have you had?
